attributes.action: Malcolm Cook - First Time Buyers Property Show
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Eliminate Stamp Duty for First Time Buyers and re-arrange the payment so the person selling the property to the FTB pays the Duty. Although it's a burden for the seller and they are faced with paying stamp duty on their next purchase as well, they have an option of adding the Duty to their sale price. Therefore the FTB can pay the Duty over a longer term on the mortgage. Or they could opt to pay a lump sum to avoid added interest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
